content: देशीय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [देशे भवः --छ] {@--1@} Belonging to a province, provincial. {@--2@} Native, local. {@--3@} Inhabiting any country (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); as in मगधदेशीय, तद्देशीय, वंगदेशीय &c. {@--4@} Not far or distant from, almost, bordering on (used as an affix at the end of words); अष्टादशवर्षदेशीयां कन्यां द दर्श <ls>K. 131</ls> ‘a girl about 18 years old (whose age bordered on 18); <ls>R. 18. 39</ls>; so पटुदेशीय &c.
